content.prompt: The Ndop portrait of King Mishe miShyaang maMbul demonstrates continuity within Kuba traditional sculpting conventions through its

choices.label: multiple nails or pointed objects driven into the figure
inclusion of a female figure towering over the seated king
rounded contours, facial expression, body position, and regalia
use of fabric and glass beads representing elephant ears and trunk

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
